00037 /// writes table of spectrum metadata to a file
00038 class PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumBinaryData : public MSDataAnalyzer
00039 {
00040     public:
00041 
00042     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Config
00043     {
00044         size_t begin;
00045         size_t end;
00046         bool interpretAsScanNumbers;
00047         size_t precision; 
00048 
00049         Config(const std::string& args = "");
00050     };
00051 
00052     SpectrumBinaryData(const MSDataCache& cache, const Config& config);
00053 
00054     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00055     //@{
00056     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo,
00057                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00058 
00059     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00060                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00061     //@}
00062 
00063     private:
00064     const MSDataCache& cache_;
00065     const Config config_;
00066 };
00067 
00068 
00069 template<>
00070 struct analyzer_strings<SpectrumBinaryData>
00071 {
00072     static const char* id() {return "binary";}
00073     static const char* description() {return "write binary data for spectra i through j";}
00074     static const char* argsFormat() {return "i[-][j] [sn] [precision=d]";}
00075 
00076     static std::vector<std::string> argsUsage() 
00077     {
00078         std::vector<std::string> result;
00079         result.push_back("sn: interpret as scan number, not index");
00080         result.push_back("precision=d: write d decimal places");
00081         return result;
00082     }
00083 };
